Debrief.ReaderWriter.ais

Class AISParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Debrief.ReaderWriter.ais.AISParser

  • public class AISParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses an AIS message.
    AIS-Message format:
    !AIVDM,[1],[2],[3],[4],[5]*[6]
    1 - Total number of sentences needed to
    transfer the message (1-9)
    2 - Sentence number (1-9)
    3 - Sequential Message identifier (Channel A-B)
    4 - Decoded AIS-Message
    5 - Number of fill-bits (0-5)
    6 - Check sum Compare IEC - 61993-2 Standard
    Author:
    David Schmitz, Alexander Lotter

      • parse

        public IAISMessage parse(java.lang.String encodedMsg)
                  throws AISParseException
        Method for parsing encoded AIS-Messages. All messages are passed to the parser in a raw format, will be validated and decoded.
        Parameters:
        encodedMsg -
        Returns:
        decoded object of a type IAISMessage
        Throws:
        AISParseException

      • isValidAIS

        public static boolean isValidAIS(java.lang.String ais)
        Validation of an AIS-Message
        Parameters:
        ais - encoded AIS-Message
        Returns:
        true if message is valid false if message is invalid

      • calcCRC

        public static java.lang.String calcCRC(java.lang.String ais)
        This method calculates the checksum for a plain AIS string AIVDM,,,,,,0 or fullfletched string !AIVDM,,,,,,0*11

      • extractCRC

        public static java.lang.String extractCRC(java.lang.String ais)
        This method extracts the checksum of a AIS string and returns it in hex notation.
        Parameters:
        ais - AIS string to extract the checksum from
        Returns:
        checksum

      • validCRC

        public static boolean validCRC(java.lang.String ais)
        Proof whether the checksum of an AIS string is valid.
        Parameters:
        ais - AIS message to check for correct CRC.
        Returns:
        true if CRC checksum is correct
